title: New riot pls
body: I noticed in the new riot pls he talked about all the updates from last video except voice chat. Has that been scrapped or is it still in early production?

replies.body: In one of the latest /Dev articles, Riot Soundwave talked a little about League Voice Comms! [**Check out this page**](https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-us/2017/12/dev-upcoming-party-changes/) and you can read everything they're thinking about by doing a quick ctrl+F for "League Voice" ^_^
